./pages/index.js */ \"./pages/index.js\");\n\n\n\n// Import the app and document modules.\n\n\n// Import the userland code.\n\n// Re-export the component (should be the default export).\n/* harmony default export */ const __WEBPACK_DEFAULT_EXPORT__ = ((0,next_dist_build_templates_helpers__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__.hoist)(_pages_index_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_5__, \"default\"));\n// /***/ "./pages/index.js":

/***/ ((__unused_webpack_module, __webpack_exports__, __webpack_require__) => {

eval("__webpack_require__.r(__webpack_exports__);\n/* harmony export */ __webpack_require__.d(__webpack_exports__, {\n/* harmony export */   \"default\": () => (/* binding */ ArkaiosUI)\n/* harmony export */ });\n/* harmony import */ var react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__ = __webpack_require__(/*! react/jsx-dev-runtime */ \"react/jsx-dev-runtime\");\n/* harmony import */ var react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0___default = /*#__PURE__*/__webpack_require__.n(react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__);\n/* harmony import */ var styled_jsx_style__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__ = __webpack_require__(/*! styled-jsx/style */ \"styled-jsx/style\");\n/* harmony import */ var styled_jsx_style__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1___default = /*#__PURE__*/__webpack_require__.n(styled_jsx_style__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__);\n/* harmony import */ var react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__ = __webpack_require__(/*! react */ \"react\");\n/* harmony import */ var react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2___default = /*#__PURE__*/__webpack_require__.n(react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__);\n/* harmony import */ var next_head__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__ = __webpack_require__(/*! next/head */ \"next/head\");\n/* harmony import */ var next_head__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3___default = /*#__PURE__*/__webpack_require__.n(next_head__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__);\n// frontend/pages/index.js\n\n\n\n\nfunction ArkaiosUI() {\n    // ==== ESTADOS ====\n    const [conversationId, setConversationId] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__.useState)(\"\");\n    const [messages, setMessages] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__.useState)([]);\n    const [input, setInput] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__.useState)(\"\");\n    const [pendingFiles, setPendingFiles] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__.useState)([]);\n    const [isConnected, setIsConnected] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__.useState)(false);\n    const [isRootMode, setIsRootMode] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__.useState)(false);\n    const [isSending, setIsSending] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__.useState)(false);\n    const historyRef = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__.useRef)(null);\n    const fileInputRef = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__.useRef)(null);\n    // ==== CONSTANTES ====\n    const API_BASE =  false ? 0 : \"\";\n    const CONVO_KEY = \"arkaios_gemini_convo\";\n    // ==== EFECTOS INICIALES ====\n    (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__.useEffect)(()=>{\n        // Generar ID de conversación\n        let cid = localStorage.getItem(CONVO_KEY);\n        if (!cid) {\n            cid = crypto.randomUUID && crypto.randomUUID() || String(Date.now());\n            localStorage.setItem(CONVO_KEY, cid);\n        }\n        setConversationId(cid);\n        // Mensaje inicial\n        addMessage({\n            text: \"\\xa1Hola! Soy Arkaios (Gemini). Puedes adjuntar im\\xe1genes o PDFs para que los tenga en cuenta. Activa \\xabModo ROOT\\xbb si necesitas una acci\\xf3n administrativa.\",\n            who: \"ai\"\n        });\n        // Verificar conexión inicial\n        checkInitialConnection();\n    }, []);\n    // Scroll al final de los mensajes\n    (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__.useEffect)(()=>{\n        if (historyRef.current) {\n            historyRef.current.scrollTop = historyRef.current.scrollHeight;\n        }\n    }, [\n        messages\n    ]);\n    // ==== FUNCIONES PRINCIPALES ====\n    const addMessage = ({ text, who = \"ai\", attachments = [], isSystem = false })=>{\n        const newMessage = {\n            id: Date.now(),\n            text,\n            who,\n            attachments,\n            isSystem,\n            timestamp: new Date()\n        };\n        setMessages((prev)=>[\n                ...prev,\n                newMessage\n            ]);\n        return newMessage;\n    };\n    const updateConnectionStatus = (connected)=>{\n        setIsConnected(connected);\n    };\n    const setConnecting = ()=>{\n        setIsConnected(false);\n    };\n    // ==== MANEJO DE ARCHIVOS ====\n    const handleFileSelect = (e)=>{\n        const newFiles = Array.from(e.target.files).filter((f)=>f.size <= 10 * 1024 * 1024);\n        if (newFiles.length !== e.target.files.length) {\n            addMessage({\n                text: \"Algunos archivos fueron omitidos por ser muy grandes (m\\xe1x 10MB)\",\n                who: \"ai\",\n                isSystem: true\n            });\n        }\n        setPendingFiles((prev)=>[\n                ...prev,\n                ...newFiles\n            ]);\n        e.target.value = \"\";\n    };\n    const removePendingFile = (indexToRemove)=>{\n        setPendingFiles((prev)=>prev.filter((_, index)=>index !== indexToRemove));\n    };\n    const clearFiles = ()=>{\n        setPendingFiles([]);\n        if (fileInputRef.current) {\n            fileInputRef.current.value = \"\";\n        }\n    };\n    // ==== COMUNICACIÓN CON API ====\n    const uploadFiles = async ()=>{\n        if (!pendingFiles.length) return [];\n        const form = new FormData();\n        pendingFiles.forEach((f)=>form.append(\"files\", f));\n        try {\n            const response = await fetch(`${API_BASE}/upload`, {\n                method: \"POST\",\n                body: form\n            });\n            if (!response.ok) {\n                const errorText = await response.text();\n                throw new Error(`Error al subir archivos: ${response.status} ${response.statusText} - ${errorText}`);\n            }\n            const data = await response.json();\n            return data.files || [];\n        } catch (error) {\n            console.error(\"Error uploading files:\", error);\n            throw error;\n        }\n    };\n    const sendMessage = async ()=>{\n        const text = input.trim();\n        if (!text && pendingFiles.length === 0) return;\n        if (isSending) return;\n        // Mostrar mensaje del usuario inmediatamente\n        const localPreviews = [];\n        for (const file of pendingFiles){\n            if (file.type.startsWith(\"image/\")) {\n                try {\n                    const preview = await new Promise((resolve, reject)=>{\n                        const reader = new FileReader();\n                        reader.onload = (e)=>resolve(e.target.result);\n                        reader.onerror = reject;\n                        reader.readAsDataURL(file);\n                    });\n                    localPreviews.push({\n                        name: file.name,\n                        preview,\n                        type: file.type\n                    });\n                } catch (e) {\n                    localPreviews.push({\n                        name: file.name,\n                        type: file.type\n                    });\n                }\n            } else {\n                localPreviews.push({\n                    name: file.name,\n                    type: file.type\n                });\n            }\n        }\n        if (text || localPreviews.length) {\n            addMessage({\n                text: text || \"(adjuntos)\",\n                who: \"user\",\n                attachments: localPreviews\n            });\n        }\n        setInput(\"\");\n        setIsSending(true);\n        try {\n            const uploaded = await uploadFiles();\n            const payload = {\n                message: text,\n                attachments: uploaded,\n                root: isRootMode,\n                conversationId\n            };\n            const response = await fetch(`${API_BASE}/chat`, {\n                method: \"POST\",\n                headers: {\n                    \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\"\n                },\n                body: JSON.stringify(payload)\n            });\n            if (!response.ok) {\n                let errorMsg;\n                try {\n                    const errorData = await response.json();\n                    errorMsg = errorData.respuesta || `Error ${response.status}: ${response.statusText}`;\n                } catch  {\n                    errorMsg = `Error ${response.status}: ${response.statusText}`;\n                }\n                throw new Error(errorMsg);\n            }\n            const data = await response.json();\n            updateConnectionStatus(true);\n            addMessage({\n                text: data.respuesta || \"(sin respuesta)\",\n                who: \"ai\",\n                attachments: uploaded\n            });\n        } catch (err) {\n            console.error(\"Error sending message:\", err);\n            updateConnectionStatus(false);\n            addMessage({\n                text: \"❌ Error: \" + err.message,\n                who: \"ai\",\n                isSystem: true\n            });\n        } finally{\n            setIsSending(false);\n            setPendingFiles([]);\n        }\n    };\n    const clearChat = async ()=>{\n        if (!confirm(\"\\xbfEst\\xe1s seguro de que quieres borrar todo el historial y la memoria?\")) return;\n        try {\n            await fetch(`${API_BASE}/clear`, {\n                method: \"POST\",\n                headers: {\n                    \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\"\n                },\n                body: JSON.stringify({\n                    conversationId\n                })\n            });\n        } catch (e) {\n            console.warn(\"Error clearing memory:\", e);\n        }\n        setMessages([]);\n        addMessage({\n            text: \"Memoria e historial de esta conversaci\\xf3n borrados.\",\n            who: \"ai\",\n            isSystem: true\n        });\n        // Mensaje inicial después de limpiar\n        addMessage({\n            text: \"\\xa1Hola! Soy Arkaios (Gemini). Puedes adjuntar im\\xe1genes o PDFs para que los tenga en cuenta. Activa \\xabModo ROOT\\xbb si necesitas una acci\\xf3n administrativa.\",\n            who: \"ai\"\n        });\n    };\n    const pingServer = async ()=>{\n        setConnecting();\n        try {\n            const response = await fetch(`${API_BASE}/health`, {\n                method: \"GET\",\n                cache: \"no-cache\"\n            });\n            if (response.ok) {\n                const data = await response.json();\n                updateConnectionStatus(true);\n                const statusMsg = `✅ Servidor OK\\n- Estado: ${data.status}\\n- Modelo: ${data.model}\\n- API configurada: ${data.api_key_configured ? \"S\\xed\" : \"No\"}\\n- Archivo HTML: ${data.html_file_exists ? \"Encontrado\" : \"Faltante\"}\\n- Directorio: ${data.current_directory}`;\n                addMessage({\n                    text: statusMsg,\n                    who: \"ai\",\n                    isSystem: true\n                });\n            } else {\n                updateConnectionStatus(false);\n                addMessage({\n                    text: \"❌ Servidor respondi\\xf3 con error: \" + response.status,\n                    who: \"ai\",\n                    isSystem: true\n                });\n            }\n        } catch (e) {\n            updateConnectionStatus(false);\n            addMessage({\n                text: \"❌ No se pudo conectar al servidor: \" + e.message,\n                who: \"ai\",\n                isSystem: true\n            });\n        }\n    };\n    const checkInitialConnection = async ()=>{\n        try {\n            const response = await fetch(`${API_BASE}/health`, {\n                method: \"GET\",\n                cache: \"no-cache\"\n            });\n            updateConnectionStatus(response.ok);\n        } catch (e) {\n            console.warn(\"Conexi\\xf3n inicial fall\\xf3:\", e);\n            updateConnectionStatus(false);\n        }\n    };\n    const handleKeyPress = (e)=>{\n        if (e.key === \"Enter\" && !e.shiftKey) {\n            e.preventDefault();\n            sendMessage();\n        }\n    };\n    // ==== RENDERIZADO ====\n    return /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.Fragment, {\n        children: [\n            /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)((next_head__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3___default()), {\n                children: [\n                    /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(\"title\", {\n                        className: \"jsx-da92fe29224c9065\",\n                        children: \"Arkaios UI — Gemini\"\n                    }, void 0, false, {\n                        fileName: \"/workspaces/AEIO-MR/frontend/pages/index.js\",\n                        lineNumber: 283,\n                        columnNumber: 9\n                    }, this),\n                    /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(\"meta\", {\n                        name: \"viewport\",\n                        content: \"width=device-width, initial-scale=1\",\n                        className: \"jsx-da92fe29224c9065\"\n                    }, void 0, false, {\n                        fileName: \"/workspaces/AEIO-MR/frontend/pages/index.js\",\n                        lineNumber: 284,\n                        columnNumber: 9\n                    }, this),\n                    /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(\"link\", {\n                        rel: \"icon\",\n                        href: \"https://img.icons8.com/fluency/48/robot-2.png\",\n                        className: \"jsx-da92fe29224c9065\"\n                    }, void 0, false, {\n                        fileName: \"/workspaces/AEIO-MR/frontend/pages/index.js\",\n                        lineNumber: 285,\n                        columnNumber: 9\n                    }, this)\n                ]\n            }, void 0, true, {\n                fileName: \"/workspaces/AEIO-MR/frontend/pages/index.js\",\n                lineNumber: 282,\n                columnNumber: 7\n            }, this),\n            /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(\"div\", {\n                className: \"jsx-da92fe29224c9065\" + \" \" + \"wrap\",\n                children: [\n                    /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(\"header\", {\n                        className: \"jsx-da92fe29224c9065\",\n                        children: [\n                            /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(\"h1\", {\n                                className: \"jsx-da92fe29224c9065\",\n                                children: \"ARKAIOS UI\"\n                            }, void 0, false, {\n                                fileName: \"/workspaces/AEIO-MR/frontend/pages/index.js\",\n                                lineNumber: 290,\n                                columnNumber: 11\n                            }, this),\n                            /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(\"span\", {\n                                className: \"jsx-da92fe29224c9065\" + \" \" + \"badge\",\n      lineNumber: 291,\n                                columnNumber: 11\n                            }, this),\n                            /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(\"span\", {\n                                className: \"jsx-da92fe29224c9065\" + \" \" + `status ${isConnected ? \"online\" : \"offline\"}`,\n                                children: isConnected ? \"Conectado\" : \"Desconectado\"\n                            }, void 0, false, {\n                                fileName: \"/workspaces/AEIO-MR/frontend/pages/index.js\",\n                                lineNumber: 292,\n                                columnNumber: 11\n                            }, this),\n                            /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(\"span\", {\n                                title: \"Permite \\xf3rdenes administrativas\",\n                                className: \"jsx-da92fe29224c9065\" + \" \" + \"right switch\",\n                                children: [\n                                    /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(\"input\", {\n                                        type: \"checkbox\",\n                                        id: \"rootToggle\",\n                                        checked: isRootMode,\n                                        onChange: (e)=>setIsRootMode(e.target.checked),\n                                        className: \"jsx-da92fe29224c9065\"\n                                    }, void 0, false, {\n                                        fileName: \"/workspaces/AEIO-MR/frontend/pages/index.js\",\n                                        lineNumber: 296,\n                                        columnNumber: 13\n                                    }, this),\n                                    /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(\"label\", {\n                                        htmlFor: \"rootToggle\",\n                                        className:  }, this)\n                                ]\n                            }, void 0, true, {\n                                fileName: \"/workspaces/AEIO-MR/frontend/pages/index.js\",\n                                lineNumber: 295,\n                                columnNumber: 11\n                            }, this)\n                        ]\n                    }, void 0, true, {\n                        fileName: \"/workspaces/AEIO-MR/frontend/pages/index.js\",\n                        lineNumber: 289,\n                        columnNumber: 9\n                    }, this),\n                    /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(\"main\", {\n                        id: \"history\",\n                        ref: historyRef,\n                        className: \"jsx-da92fe29224c9065\",\n                        children: messages.map((msg)=>/*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(\"div\", {\n                                className: \"jsx-da92fe29224c9065\" + \" \" + `msg ${msg.who} ${msg.isSystem ? \"system\" : \"\"} ${msg.who === \"ai\" && isRootMode ? \"root\" : \"\"}`,\n                                children: [\n                                    /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(\"div\", {\n                                        className: ;

// load runtime
var __webpack_require__ = require("../webpack-runtime.js");
__webpack_require__.C(exports);
var __webpack_exec__ = (moduleId) => (__webpack_require__(__webpack_require__.s = moduleId))
var __webpack_exports__ = __webpack_require__.X(0, ["vendor-chunks/next","vendor-chunks/@swc"], () => (__webpack_exec__("./node_modules/next/dist/build/webpack/loaders/next-route-loader/index.js?kind=PAGES&page=%2F&preferredRegion=&absolutePagePath=.%2Fpages%2Findex.js&absoluteAppPath=private-next-pages%2F_app&absoluteDocumentPath=private-next-pages%2F_document&middlewareConfigBase64=e30%3D!")));
module.exports = __webpack_exports__;

})();
--- END CONTENT ---
